rooms.name: Living Room & Home Theater Combined
rooms.description: This space is designed to serve dual purposes: a living area during the day and a home theater in the evenings. The room has acoustic panels and LED dimmable lighting for optimal audiovisual experience.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated office space with soundproof walls, ergonomic furniture placement, and ample natural light from north-facing windows for a productive environment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed in accordance with Vastu principles to ensure calm energy. The master bed is positioned in the southeast corner of the room.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open kitchen design integrated with living area for social cooking. Features include energy-efficient appliances and water-saving fixtures to support eco-friendly practices.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bathroom designed with water conservation in mind.
